Text: FW True Quote InformationPST Thank you for your interest in the True Quote Energy Trading System The platform can be accessed by using your Internet Explorer version or higher and going to wwwtruequotecom on the internet While on the True Quote Homepage please take a few minutes to familiarize yourself with the action tabs that can provide excellent information for anyone in the energy trading industry such as News Including daily updates in our Nymex and Gas Storage reports and forecasts by our staff Meteorologist Tutorial An informative Flash demonstration on the use of True Quote Contact Us Email any questions you may have directly to our Client Service Department System Overview Learn about features that set True Quote apart from other systems We have also attached an updated Users Guide that will walk you through truequotecoms functionality We have generated and assigned you a specific User ID and Password listed below USER ID jeffking PASSWORD bailey For security purposes we suggest you utilize the option we provide to change your password once you successfully access the system If you have any questions regarding the system please feel free to call our Client Service Department at Trevor L Atkins Project Manager True Quote LLC Work Direct truequote users guide doc
